cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 29th Nov 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 29th Nov 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard 3 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Emu Park Beach Resort rooms feature balconies with garden or pool views, private bathrooms, modern amenities such as tea and coffee makers, free toiletries, and TVs. All rooms & private pools enhance the stay. Friendly staff always ready for service.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
